Articles.Content:
http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/rdoverview/

Hi, trying to get R&D Overview to work, but have no success,

Any1 know where to unpack,

had try in kerbals root & plugins folders.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/rdoverview/

Hi, trying to get R&D Overview to work, but have no success,

Any1 know where to unpack,

had try in kerbals root & plugins folders.

Treat it just like any other plugin. I copied the "ScienceLog" folder into ...\Kerbal Space Program\GameData and it came up fine.
